name: smart-agents-foundry
description: Azure AI Foundry Smart Support Agent - Demo repository

scripts.demo01: cd demos/01-triage-promptflow && pf flow test -f flow.dag.yaml --inputs ticket_text="VPN disconnects every 5 minutes"
scripts.demo02:flow: cd demos/02-rag-search && pf flow test -f flow.dag.yaml --inputs question="How to reset my account password?"
scripts.infra:deploy: az deployment sub create --location eastus --template-file infra/main.bicep --parameters @infra/parameters.dev.json
